sentences.english: To Indra in the tumult of battle.
sentences.chinese: 以因陀羅在喧譁的戰鬥。
“因陀羅的標槍”經過一個圓形的“反射體”而運作。

sentences.english: Vritra ninety-nine fortresses, and then came upon the dragon .
sentences.chinese: 因陀羅摧毀了維他的九十九座城堡，然後與維他交手。

sentences.english: Indra and the beautiful Indrani presided over their paradise .
sentences.chinese: 因陀羅和美麗的因陀拉尼管理着他們的天堂。

sentences.english: Indra took the garland, but placed it on the forehead of his elephant.
sentences.chinese: 因陀羅收下了花環，但把它放置在大象的前額上。

sentences.english: And solid is this vast Earth, guarded by Indra.
sentences.chinese: 和固體這個龐大的地球，看守因陀羅。

sentences.english: Indra smashed through Vritra ninety-nine fortresses, and then came upon the dragon .
sentences.chinese: 因陀羅摧毀了維他的九十九座城堡，然後與維他交手。

definition: Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
to transmit Buddhist teaching/chakram or chakka (throwing disk)
forged book/book of dubious authenticity/misattributed book/Apocrypha
Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition/Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues
the Four Noble Truths (Buddhism)/see also 四諦|四谛[si4 di4] and 苦集滅道|苦集灭道[ku3 ji2 mie4 dao4]
variant of 圖像|图像[tu2 xiang4]
